ruling: - Removing all cards in your hand and your side of the field from play is a cost to activate [[Card of Sanctity]]. If you have no other cards except for [[Card of Sanctity]], you cannot activate it. You must have at least 1 other card on your side of the field or in your hand.
- You can chain [[Null and Void]] to [[Card of Sanctity]].
- [[Card of Sanctity]] itself is not removed from play by its cost.
